msbt.message: It feels like everyone on the island is holding their breath, waiting.I wonder what's coming, or who
I heard that something's going to happen around here tomorrow.Not sure what or who is coming, but it feels like is just holding its breath.
, have you heard?There's going to be another Fishing Tourney this Saturday!Between now and then, I need to research and brush up on all the latest fishing tips and tricks!
The Fishing Tourney's almost here!I've been dreaming of all the rare and exotic fish out there I could reel in!
There's a Bug-Off this Saturday!Are you going to try to catch some bugs too, ?I'm so excited that I picked up a bunch of new bug field guides to study ahead of the big event!

One more sleep until the Bug-Off!I had to patch a few holes in my net, but I'm glad I found them in time to get them fixed ahead of the event.I'm still hoping to get in some more practice at sneaking up on bugs.
Today's Saturday, which means The Happy Home Academy will be evaluating homes tomorrow morning! I'm trying to resist the urge to do a bunch of last-minute redecorating
Have you read your evaluation from the Happy Home Academy yet, ? I haven't worked up the courage yet myself, .
How is it already almost the end of the year? It all went by so fastStill, I'm looking forward to staying up until midnight so I can join the New Year Countdown in the plaza!
, can you believe 's almost over?Everyone will be in the plaza just ahead of the New Year, counting down until we all get a fresh start.
